content.p: Build a strong academic foundation and develop essential skills to prepare for undergraduate studies in humanities including media, communications and English. Media, communication, culture, and language underpin much of modern life. Our undergraduate programmes provide you with the skills and knowledge necessary to engage in global discourse and understand the implications of a rapidly digitalising world. Our postgraduate programmes offer advanced studies in media, languages, and cultures, providing interactive workshops, guest lectures, and study tours to complement your learning experience. Our community of diverse researchers and academics is of international standing and we are internationally recognised for the standard of our research. Join our diverse research community, recognised internationally for its contributions to humanities. Youâ€™ll have access to world-class resources and gain hands-on experience with study tours, industry guest lectures, and interactive workshops. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8693 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
